node.title: Debating God
node.description: Life can seem unfair. You do your best to be a good citizen, an upright person, and in spite of your best efforts, things just don't go your way. It can even feel as if God has deserted you, just when you needed Him most. Life can seem unjust, but on this program Shawn Boonstra shows us just where to find God when we need Him.
